Description: US Buyers: No taxes, duties or brokerage fees Guitar comes with OHSC in excellent condition and signed check list Besides some very light surface swirling mostly invisible on the pictures the guitar is mint. Specifications: - Weight: 8 lbs 12 oz - 60' neck profile slim taper - Burst bucker pickups - Coil splitting on both pickups via push pull - True By pass and out of phase via push pull - Grover locking tuners - 120th anniversary inlay at the 12th fret - Quilt Maple top hand selected and book matched (signature on the back panel) Some suggestions: Please note that some settings on this guitar like action, intonation, neck adjustment etc .....may need to be adjusted to your specific style of playing. Also once you have received the guitar you should leave the instrument in the case for at least 6 hours, so the instrument can acclimate to its new environment Return and refund procedure: Item can be returned within 3 days of receipt. - Item arrived damaged or not as described: Full refund and seller pays for the return shipping costs - The customer didn't like the item (color, tone, neck size, weight etc....): Full refund less 10% restocking fee and buyer pays for the return shipping costs. - No partial refund. - Refund will be issued once the guitar is back in the sellers hand Carriers: - USPS for the United States - Canada Post for Canada
Title: 2014 Gibson Les Paul Standard Premium Quilt hand selected with OHSC
